content: Hi, I'm trying to use the Notepad++ FHIR plugin from http://www.healthintersections.com.au/?p=2386. It's linked from the official FHIR site. However, I continue to get the errors about the value not being in the value set. I even copied some of the official FHIR examples, and still the same error. Am I doing something wrong? Or is this plugin broken? Thanks.
the validator is currently broken - I'l hoping to release a new version shortly.
Ah ok, well I'm glad it's nothing I'm doing. Thanks for the quick response, and I look forward to the fixed version.
